name: Declutter Series - Tumblr
description: Removes adverts, recommended blogs, and useless buttons. Makes full use of screen space with wideview. Faithful in style to unmodified Tumblr, compatible with most other themes and XKit. Part of the Declutter Series.

user.name: Herossaumure
user.about: I am gradually learning HTML5 and CSS by making styles and websites. Visit my testing page: Testing Site for HTML (tumblr) Contact me: Herossaumure (tumblr) Herossaumure (reddit)
